title: Condensed serif
content:
Carlotta Bakery — designed by Anagrama

Hello,  
I was hoping one of you wise folk might be able to help identify this condensed serif. I'm sure a certain amount of customisation has been applied, but if anyone can point me in the right rough direction that'd be brilliant.

Thanks in advance,  
Ed

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100304im_/http:/typophile.com/files/01_4169.jpg)

URL: (for more shots of typeface)  
 [http://www.anagrama.com/portafolio/188-carlotta](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100304/http:/www.anagrama.com/portafolio/188-carlotta "http://www.anagrama.com/portafolio/188-carlotta")
author: TypoBeac

comments.content: My first hunch was "customized [Benguiat](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100304/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/benguiat) Condensed Book but that would be a long journey. Some more I like: [Manchester](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100304/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/manchester), [Ayres](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100304/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/Ayres-Typeface/9101641), [Polyspring](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100304/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pintassilgo/polyspring), [Romantica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100304/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cruz/romantica-pro), [Desire](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100304/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/desire), [Carlington](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415100304/http:/creativemarket.com/twicolabs/28921-Carlingford)
Yeah it's near but not quite right. Thanks a lot though :)
